data.title: City of Huntington Beach, CA PURCHASES OF GOODS AND SERVICES
data.meta_description: Ch 3.02  The Central Services Division is established for the purpose of providing for centralized purchasing of all supplies, services and equipment for the various agencies of the City.(2259-2/78, 2464-12/80, 3510-10/01, 3718-8/05) This chapter is adopted in or
data.meta_site_name: City of Huntington Beach, CA Code
data.text: In case of an emergency which requires the immediate procurement of a commodity or service, the City Manager may authorize the Finance Officer to secure by the open-market procedure, at the lowest obtainable price, any service or commodity regardless of the amount of the expenditure.
